SKT_FIRST.name: Wailing Rhapsody
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>的几率使目标<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_SECOND.name: Valiant Concerto
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to decrease the target's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的概率使目标的<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Night at the Opera
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: ナイト・オブ・ジ・オペラ
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>スタン</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 대상을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>스턴</color> 상태로 만듭니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>的几率使目标陷入<color=#28d9ed>晕眩</color>状态,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases the chance to inflict Stunned by 15%

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Increases the chance to inflict Stunned by 15%

SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: スタン強化\n(効果抵抗無視)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 强化晕眩\n(无视效果抵抗)

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to reduce Defense of the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to reduce <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> of the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で対象の防御力を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 대상의 방어력을 감소시킵니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 적 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 감소시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率使目标的防御力降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>的几率使敌人目标的<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
